AboutPage.#ConcreteDesc: Our mission is to transform ideas and internal processes into concrete, stable and intuitive digital solutions.
AboutPage.#HeroFirstDesc: designs custom web applications to modernize internal processes and improve operational efficiency.
AboutPage.#HeroSecondDesc: We help SMEs and startups gain efficiency through simple, personalized and scalable digital solutions.
AboutPage.#HeroTitle: A simple, useful and sustainable approach
AboutPage.#ImpactDesc: We aim to help companies save time, reduce errors and streamline their operations.
AboutPage.#OurMissionDesc: What guides our decisions and the way we build.
AboutPage.#OurVisionDesc: Building sustainable, elegant and useful digital products designed to support the real growth of businesses.
AboutPage.#ProjectOnYourMindDesc: Let’s talk and see how BEYOND can help you in a concrete way.
AboutPage.#SimpleDesc: We believe companies don't always need complex tools, but tools adapted to their real needs.
AboutPage.#CommitmentDesc: Supporting the client from idea to delivery.
AboutPage.#OnFitDesc: Every company is unique, and so are its tools.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.desc1: All elements on the BEYOND website (texts, images, logos, graphics, structure, code) are protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.desc2: Any reproduction, representation, or use, in whole or in part, without prior written authorization is strictly prohibited.

liability.title: 5. Liability
liability.desc: BEYOND strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information. However, BEYOND cannot be held liable for errors, omissions, or temporary unavailability of the website.

externalLinks.title: 6. External Links
externalLinks.desc: The website may contain links to external websites. BEYOND assumes no responsibility for the content of such third-party websites.

law.title: 7. Governing Law
law.desc1: This website is governed by French law.
law.desc2: In the event of a dispute, the French courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.desc1: This privacy policy aims to inform users of the BEYOND website about how their personal data is collected, used, and protected.
intro.desc2: BEYOND is committed to respecting the confidentiality of personal data and processing it in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable French law.

data.title: 3. Collected Data
data.desc: As part of the use of the website, BEYOND may collect the following data:

items.name: First and last name
items.message: Message sent via the contact form

purpose.title: 4. Purpose of Processing
purpose.desc: Personal data is collected solely for the following purposes:

items.contact: Responding to requests sent via the contact form
items.project: Communicating in the context of a project or collaboration

purpose.note: Data is never sold, rented, or transferred to third parties.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention Period
retention.desc: Personal data is retained for a maximum period of 3 years from the last contact, unless otherwise required by law.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.desc: BEYOND implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of personal data and prevent unauthorized access, loss, or disclosure.

rights.title: 7. User Rights
rights.desc: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, you may contact BEYOND at the following address:

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.desc1: The BEYOND website may use cookies strictly necessary for its proper functioning or for audience measurement purposes.
cookies.desc2: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies.

updates.title: 9. Policy Updates
updates.desc: BEYOND reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time to remain compliant with legal or regulatory changes.
